org.hazelwire.virtualmachine
Class VMHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.hazelwire.virtualmachine.VMHandler

public class VMHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all the communication with the VirtualBox application. It can be used both in a static way and in an OOP way by initiating the class as an object.

Author:
Tim Strijdhorst

importAndDiscover

public void importAndDiscover()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Reads the vm list, imports, and reads the vm list again. It will take a diff and the difference is the string for our vmname. Extract the information we need with a regular expression.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

discoverBootedVM

public boolean discoverBootedVM(int hostPort)
Keep trying to make a connection to a certain port on the host system that is routed to the VM by a NAT forward. Assuming that the port is really forwarded and the service is start on bootup it will fail to connect untill the VM has fully booted.

Parameters:
hostPort -
